description.value:
Arcane adept package

Source Adventurer's Armory 2 pg. 4
Price 1000 gp; Weight 45 lbs.
Category Kits

Description

The arcane adept has collected useful magical gear to ensure her success on her adventures, and she prides herself on having just the right tool for the job. This equipment package is appropriate for an arcanistACG, sorcerer, witchAPG, or wizard. Some bards and summonersAPG might also find it attractive. This equipment package can also work for a magusUM if the 1st-level scrolls and wand are replaced with a masterwork melee weapon.
Weapons: Light crossbow with 10 bolts, quarterstaff.
Combat Gear: Acid (2), scrolls of comprehend languages (2), scroll of detect secret doors, scroll of glitterdust, scrolls of identify (2), scroll of mount, scroll of rope trick, thunderstone, wand of mage armor (16 charges).
Other Gear: Backpack, bedroll, belt pouch, candles (5), chalk (5 pieces), flint and steel, ink, inkpen, ioun torchUE, journalUE, magnifying glass, mess kitUE, scroll boxUE, silk rope (50 ft.), spell component pouch, trail rations (5 days), waterskin, 3 gp.
Total Weight: 45 lbs. (28-3/4 lbs. for a Small character).
